rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0001
rows.name: Thanks everyone for coming today!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0002
rows.name:
We hope you enjoy performance of
"Invidia Goes To War".

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0003
rows.name: This is gonna be so much fun!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0004
rows.name:
Are we the only ones watching?
Where did Nia go off to?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0005
rows.name: I dunno...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0006
rows.name:
Queen Lagert! Me think time has come
to go to war with Superbia!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0007
rows.name: This is most sudden, War Minister.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0008
rows.name: My lady...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0009
rows.name: Wow, you're great, Nia!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0010
rows.name:
Shut it, you!
I didn't ask to take part in this farce!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0011
rows.name: Ahem. This not sudden, Your Majesty.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0012
rows.name:
We preparing for war ever since
Superbia take occupation of Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0013
rows.name: Then the preparations are complete?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0014
rows.name:
Preparations go steady for long time,
but we can quickly make complete.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0015
rows.name:
Superbia soon try to conquer other
countries aside from Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0016
rows.name:
We can not allow ambitions to succeed.
Must start war at earliest possibility!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0017
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0018
rows.name:
So be it, then.
Let us make war.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0019
rows.name: Wait one moment please!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0020
rows.name: You have concerns, High Minister?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0021
rows.name:
Divine Beast of Superbia quickly becoming
so barren, crops can not be grown.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0022
rows.name:
Meanwhile we have rich soil, producing
much delicious Gromrice.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0023
rows.name:
Why bother with war when Superbia
collapse on its own from famine?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0024
rows.name: A valid question.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0025
rows.name:
No, no. If we wait, Superbia just
conquer more territories like Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0026
rows.name:
With more territories, Superbia
become still greater threat!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0027
rows.name:
Even if Superbia Divine Beast collapse
completely, may still be difficult to
defeat whole Empire!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0028
rows.name: There no need to be hasty.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0029
rows.name:
Superbia still not have enough
territory or supplies to properly
provide for own people.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0030
rows.name:
Gula alone not enough to support
whole of Superbian population.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0031
rows.name:
In other words, more prudent to
wait for Superbia to grow weaker
before attacking.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0032
rows.name: Your argument is compelling.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0033
rows.name:
That not happen today or tomorrow
though!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0034
rows.name:
No! Might take many decades to
happen, or even centuries!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0035
rows.name:
We can not allow Superbia threat
to remain longer than necessary!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0036
rows.name:
That quite true, but now is
not time to rush into things!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0037
rows.name:
War preparations may be in progress,
but still not in optimal condition!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0038
rows.name:
This argument never end.
Your Majesty must make final decision!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0039
rows.name: Huh? You want me to decide?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0040
rows.name: Your Majesty is Queen of Invidia.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0041
rows.name: Oh...yeah, right...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0042
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0043
rows.name: Let's go to war!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0044
rows.name: Let's wait a little longer.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0047
rows.name:
What now?
Did you both forget your lines?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0048
rows.name:
Script of "Invidia Goes To War"
end here. No more lines to say.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0049
rows.name: Thank you for coming today, everyone!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0050
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0051
rows.name:
By showing this play to the children,
you'll get them to think for themselves
about whether Invidia should go to war.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0052
rows.name: That's quite clever, actually.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0053
rows.name:
It's a difficult question. I can see the
kids having split opinions, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0054
rows.name:
You force me to take part in this thing
and then it just ends like that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0055
rows.name: This is SO not satisfying!
